data.title: Pentair Pool Europe
data.meta_description: Remote Monitoring and Control system designed to get the most out of your IntelliFlo variable speed pump. IntelliPool controls filtration, heating, lights, any type of sanitizing (Cl dosing, salt chlorinator, Ph control pump) from anywhere in the world. Visit www.intellipool.eu here.FEATURES:
data.text:
IntelliPool

Complete and smart automation system Pentair "INTELLI" devices.

Connected products

Smart & Sustainable

Equipment that is easy to use, reliable and durable, able to operate efficiently continuously and autonomously, saves resources (energy, water, products) and has a low environmental impact (life cycle of the swimming pool).

Peace of mind

Remote monitoring

Evolutive solution

Tradegrade

PIP Product

Elegible product for points on the Partners Incentive Program for professionals.

Remote Monitoring and Control system designed to get the most out of your IntelliFlo variable speed pump. IntelliPool controls filtration, heating, lights, any type of sanitizing (Cl dosing, salt chlorinator, Ph control pump) from anywhere in the world. Visit www.intellipool.eu here.

FEATURES:

Filtration, water temperature and light control

Control and diagnostics of IntelliFlo variable speed pumps

Control salt chlorinator or dosing pump (provided separately) by ORP regulation and digital display of ORP value locally and remotely

Adjustment of pH set point and digital display of pH value locally and remotely

Control and advanced diagnostics of the lntelliChlor chlorinator

System connects wireless to the home internet router to provide remote monitoring and control anywhere, anytime from a computer, smartphone or tablet (not included)

Pool Professionals can remotely monitor and perform maintenance from a computer, smartphone or tablet

Real-time information on the status of your swimming pool and your equipment

The IntelliPool application is designed to make the most of your IntelliFlo variable speed pump. IntelliPool controls the filtration, the heating, the lighting, any kind of remote disinfection. This system makes full use of the communication between Pentair’s “Intelli” devices and it also allows professionals to monitor and maintain pool equipment remotely. App Store Google Play Store

Features & Benefits

Control all pool equipment locally or remotely

Full automation system dedicated to Pentair "Intelli" products

Solutions made from proven and durable products

Reliable solutions

Three full systems adapted to water treatment technology

Several systems available to meet automation and water treatment requirements

The connected and free system

Enables remote monitoring and control 24/7 from your computer, smartphone or tablet.

Professional access for greater peace of mind

Possibility of entrusting the remote management of your pool to the service provider of your choice.

Documentation

For members only

Log in to access to the documentation

Catalog

Spare parts

Firmware manual

Firmware 5.20
